name: Spacebook (thatwhichis)
description:
UPDATE: The old other social media integrations are broken now! You used to be able to spam other social medias with your Spacebook progress and invite them to Spacebook!

Spacebook is a Ludum Dare 31 social media simulator simulating emulating social interaction with a social media centre. OTHER SOCIAL MEDIA SIMULATORS ARE AGGREGATING YOU DATAS AND CONNECTING YOU AT OTHER PEOPLE, WELL NOT SPACE BOOK- THE SPCAEBOOK is the cutting edge in not connecting you technology.
